verses.verse: Ἦν <WG1510> Ēn there was ( Jesus and Nicodemus) δὲ <WG1161> de Now ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos a man ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τῶν <WG3588> tōn the Φαρισαίων <WG5330> Pharisaiōn Pharisees Νικόδημος <WG3530> Nikodēmos Nicodemus , ὄνομα <WG3686> onoma named αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . ἄρχων <WG758> archōn a leader τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the Ἰουδαίων <WG2453> Ioudaiōn Jews .

οὗτος <WG3778> houtos He ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen came πρὸς <WG4314> pros to αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Jesus] νυκτὸς <WG3571> nyktos at night καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - , Ῥαββί <WG4461> Rhabbi “ Rabbi , οἴδαμεν <WG1492> oidamen we know ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God . ἐλήλυθας <WG2064> elēlythas who has come διδάσκαλος <WG1320> didaskalos [You are] a teacher οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis no one γὰρ <WG1063> gar For δύναται <WG1410> dynatai could ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta [the] τὰ <WG3588> ta - σημεῖα <WG4592> sēmeia signs ποιεῖν <WG4160> poiein perform ἃ <WG3739> ha - σὺ <WG4771> sy You ποιεῖς <WG4160> poieis are doing ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if μὴ <WG3361> mē not ᾖ <WG1510> ē were ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God μετ’ <WG3326> met’ with αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou him . ”

Ἀπεκρίθη <WG611> Apekrithē replied Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen . . . αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , Ἀμὴν <WG281> Amēn “ Truly , ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn truly , λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell σοι <WG4771> soi you , ἐὰν <WG1437> ean unless μή <WG3361> mē . . . τις <WG5100> tis one γεννηθῇ <WG1080> gennēthē he is born ἄνωθεν <WG509> anōthen again . ” ( Or born from above; also in verse 7.) οὐ <WG3756> ou no δύναται <WG1410> dynatai can ἰδεῖν <WG3708> idein see τὴν <WG3588> tēn the βασιλείαν <WG932> basileian kingdom τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei asked πρὸς <WG4314> pros - αὐτὸν <WG846> auton - . ὁ <WG3588> ho - Νικόδημος <WG3530> Nikodēmos Nicodemus Πῶς <WG4459> Pōs “ How δύναται <WG1410> dynatai can ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos a man γεννηθῆναι <WG1080> gennēthēnai be born γέρων <WG1088> gerōn old ? ” ὤν <WG1510> ōn when he is μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv δύναται <WG1410> dynatai “ Can he εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κοιλίαν <WG2836> koilian womb τῆς <WG3588> tēs - μητρὸς <WG3384> mētros mother’s αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his δεύτερον <WG1208> deuteron a second time εἰσελθεῖν <WG1525> eiselthein enter καὶ <WG2532> kai - γεννηθῆναι <WG1080> gennēthēnai to be born ? ”

Ἀπεκρίθη <WG611> Apekrithē answered , Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Ἀμὴν <WG281> Amēn “ Truly , ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn truly , λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell σοι <WG4771> soi you , ἐὰν <WG1437> ean unless μή <WG3361> mē . . . τις <WG5100> tis one γεννηθῇ <WG1080> gennēthē he is born ἐξ <WG1537> ex of ὕδατος <WG5204> hydatos water καὶ <WG2532> kai and Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos [the] Spirit . οὐ <WG3756> ou no δύναται <WG1410> dynatai can εἰσελθεῖν <WG1525> eiselthein enter εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn the βασιλείαν <WG932> basileian kingdom τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God

τὸ <WG3588> to - γεγεννημένον <WG1080> gegennēmenon born ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τῆς <WG3588> tēs - σαρκὸς <WG4561> sarkos flesh , σάρξ <WG4561> sarx Flesh ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is καὶ <WG2532> kai [but] τὸ <WG3588> to - γεγεννημένον <WG1080> gegennēmenon born ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit . πνεῦμά <WG4151> pneuma spirit ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is

μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv θαυμάσῃς <WG2296> thaumasēs Do not be amazed ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that εἶπόν <WG2036> eipon I said σοι <WG4771> soi - , Δεῖ <WG1163> Dei must ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas ‘ You ( The Greek word for you is plural; also in verse 12.) γεννηθῆναι <WG1080> gennēthēnai be born ἄνωθεν <WG509> anōthen again . ’

τὸ <WG3588> to The πνεῦμα <WG4151> pneuma wind ὅπου <WG3699> hopou where θέλει <WG2309> thelei it wishes . πνεῖ <WG4154> pnei blows καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὴν <WG3588> tēn - φωνὴν <WG5456> phōnēn sound , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou its ἀκούεις <WG191> akoueis You hear ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv οἶδας <WG1492> oidas you do not know πόθεν <WG4159> pothen where ἔρχεται <WG2064> erchetai it comes from καὶ <WG2532> kai [or] ποῦ <WG4226> pou where ὑπάγει <WG5217> hypagei it is going . οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs So ἐστὶν <WG1510> estin it is πᾶς <WG3956> pas with everyone ὁ <WG3588> ho - γεγεννημένος <WG1080> gegennēmenos born ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit . ”

Ἀπεκρίθη <WG611> Apekrithē asked Νικόδημος <WG3530> Nikodēmos Nicodemus καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen . . . αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . . Πῶς <WG4459> Pōs “ How δύναται <WG1410> dynatai can ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta this γενέσθαι <WG1096> genesthai be ? ”

Ἀπεκρίθη <WG611> Apekrithē said Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen . . . αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , Σὺ <WG4771> Sy “ You εἶ <WG1510> ei are ὁ <WG3588> ho - διδάσκαλος <WG1320> didaskalos teacher , ” τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Ἰσραὴλ <WG2474> Israēl Israel’s καὶ <WG2532> kai “ and ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these things ? οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv γινώσκεις <WG1097> ginōskeis you do not understand

ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn Truly , ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn truly , λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell σοι <WG4771> soi you , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - ὃ <WG3739> ho of what οἴδαμεν <WG1492> oidamen we know , λαλοῦμεν <WG2980> laloumen we speak καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὃ <WG3739> ho to what ἑωράκαμεν <WG3708> heōrakamen we have seen , μαρτυροῦμεν <WG3140> martyroumen we testify καὶ <WG2532> kai and yet τὴν <WG3588> tēn - μαρτυρίαν <WG3141> martyrian testimony . ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv λαμβάνετε <WG2983> lambanete you people do not accept

Εἰ <WG1487> Ei If τὰ <WG3588> ta things ἐπίγεια <WG1919> epigeia earthly εἶπον <WG2036> eipon I have told ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you about καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv πιστεύετε <WG4100> pisteuete you do not believe , πῶς <WG4459> pōs how ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if εἴπω <WG2036> eipō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you about τὰ <WG3588> ta things ? ἐπουράνια <WG2032> epourania heavenly πιστεύσετε <WG4100> pisteusete will you believe

καὶ <WG2532> kai - οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis No one ἀναβέβηκεν <WG305> anabebēken has ascended εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸν <WG3588> ton - οὐρανὸν <WG3772> ouranon heaven εἰ <WG1487> ei except μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ὁ <WG3588> ho the [One who] ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou - οὐρανοῦ <WG3772> ouranou heaven — καταβάς <WG2597> katabas descended ὁ <WG3588> ho the Υἱὸς <WG5207> Huios Son τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ἀνθρώπου <WG444> anthrōpou of Man . ( BYZ and TR include who is in heaven.)

καὶ <WG2532> kai Just καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs as Μωϋσῆς <WG3475> Mōusēs Moses ὕψωσεν <WG5312> hypsōsen lifted up τὸν <WG3588> ton the ὄφιν <WG3789> ophin snake ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the ἐρήμῳ <WG2048> erēmō wilderness , οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs so ὑψωθῆναι <WG5312> hypsōthēnai be lifted up , δεῖ <WG1163> dei must τὸν <WG3588> ton the Υἱὸν <WG5207> Huion Son τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ἀνθρώπου <WG444> anthrōpou of Man

ἵνα <WG2443> hina that πᾶς <WG3956> pas everyone ὁ <WG3588> ho who πιστεύων <WG4100> pisteuōn believes ἐν <WG1722> en in αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him ἔχῃ <WG2192> echē may have ζωὴν <WG2222> zōēn life . ( Or everyone who believes may have eternal life in Him.) αἰώνιον <WG166> aiōnion eternal

Οὕτως <WG3779> Houtōs so γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἠγάπησεν <WG25> ēgapēsen loved ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world ὥστε <WG5620> hōste that τὸν <WG3588> ton [His] Υἱὸν <WG5207> Huion Son , τὸν <WG3588> ton - μονογενῆ <WG3439> monogenē one and only ( Or only begotten or unique; also in verse 18) ἔδωκεν <WG1325> edōken He gave ἵνα <WG2443> hina that πᾶς <WG3956> pas everyone ὁ <WG3588> ho who πιστεύων <WG4100> pisteuōn believes εἰς <WG1519> eis in αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv ἀπόληται <WG622> apolētai shall not perish ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ἔχῃ <WG2192> echē have ζωὴν <WG2222> zōēn life . αἰώνιον <WG166> aiōnion eternal

οὐ <WG3756> ou did not γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἀπέστειλεν <WG649> apesteilen send ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God τὸν <WG3588> ton - Υἱὸν <WG5207> Huion His Son εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world ἵνα <WG2443> hina to κρίνῃ <WG2919> krinē condemn τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world , ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ἵνα <WG2443> hina to σωθῇ <WG4982> sōthē save ὁ <WG3588> ho the κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos world δι’ <WG1223> di’ through αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him .

ὁ <WG3588> ho Whoever πιστεύων <WG4100> pisteuōn believes εἰς <WG1519> eis in αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv κρίνεται <WG2919> krinetai is not condemned , ὁ <WG3588> ho whoever ‹δὲ› <WG1161> de but μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv πιστεύων <WG4100> pisteuōn does not believe ἤδη <WG2235> ēdē vvv κέκριται <WG2919> kekritai has already been condemned , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv πεπίστευκεν <WG4100> pepisteuken he has not believed εἰς <WG1519> eis in τὸ <WG3588> to the ὄνομα <WG3686> onoma name τοῦ <WG3588> tou - μονογενοῦς <WG3439> monogenous one and only Υἱοῦ <WG5207> Huiou Son . τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God’s

Αὕτη <WG3778> Hautē this δέ <WG1161> de And ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ἡ <WG3588> hē the κρίσις <WG2920> krisis verdict ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - : τὸ <WG3588> to The φῶς <WG5457> phōs Light ἐλήλυθεν <WG2064> elēlythen has come εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world , καὶ <WG2532> kai but ἠγάπησαν <WG25> ēgapēsan loved οἱ <WG3588> hoi - ἄνθρωποι <WG444> anthrōpoi men μᾶλλον <WG3123> mallon rather τὸ <WG3588> to the σκότος <WG4655> skotos darkness ἢ <WG2228> ē than τὸ <WG3588> to the φῶς <WG5457> phōs Light ἦν <WG1510> ēn were γὰρ <WG1063> gar because αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their πονηρὰ <WG4190> ponēra evil . τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔργα <WG2041> erga deeds

πᾶς <WG3956> pas Everyone γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ὁ <WG3588> ho who φαῦλα <WG5337> phaula evil πράσσων <WG4238> prassōn does μισεῖ <WG3404> misei hates τὸ <WG3588> to the φῶς <WG5457> phōs Light , καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐκ <WG3756> ouk does not ἔρχεται <WG2064> erchetai come πρὸς <WG4314> pros into τὸ <WG3588> to the φῶς <WG5457> phōs Light ἵνα <WG2443> hina for fear that μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ἐλεγχθῇ <WG1651> elenchthē will be exposed . τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔργα <WG2041> erga deeds αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his

ὁ <WG3588> ho whoever δὲ <WG1161> de But ποιῶν <WG4160> poiōn practices τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ἀλήθειαν <WG225> alētheian truth ἔρχεται <WG2064> erchetai comes πρὸς <WG4314> pros into τὸ <WG3588> to the φῶς <WG5457> phōs Light , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that φανερωθῇ <WG5319> phanerōthē it may be seen clearly αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [what] he τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔργα <WG2041> erga has done ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐν <WG1722> en in Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God .” ( Some translators close this quotation after verse 15.) ἐστιν <WG1510> estin has been εἰργασμένα <WG2038> eirgasmena accomplished

( John’s Testimony about Jesus) Μετὰ <WG3326> Meta After ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta this , ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen went ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi - μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn the Ἰουδαίαν <WG2453> Ioudaian Judean γῆν <WG1093> gēn countryside , καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐκεῖ <WG1563> ekei [where] διέτριβεν <WG1304> dietriben He spent some time μετ’ <WG3326> met’ with αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn them καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐβάπτιζεν <WG907> ebaptizen baptized .

Ἦν <WG1510> Ēn was δὲ <WG1161> de Now καὶ <WG2532> kai also ‹ὁ› <WG3588> ho - Ἰωάννης <WG2491> Iōannēs John βαπτίζων <WG907> baptizōn baptizing ἐν <WG1722> en at Αἰνὼν <WG137> Ainōn Aenon ἐγγὺς <WG1451> engys near τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Σαλείμ <WG4530> Saleim Salim , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ὕδατα <WG5204> hydata [the] water πολλὰ <WG4183> polla plentiful ἦν <WG1510> ēn was ἐκεῖ <WG1563> ekei there , καὶ <WG2532> kai and παρεγίνοντο <WG3854> pareginonto [people] kept coming καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐβαπτίζοντο <WG907> ebaptizonto to be baptized .

οὔπω <WG3768> oupō had not yet γὰρ <WG1063> gar (For ἦν <WG1510> ēn been βεβλημένος <WG906> beblēmenos thrown εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn - φυλακὴν <WG5438> phylakēn prison .) ‹ὁ› <WG3588> ho - Ἰωάννης <WG2491> Iōannēs John

Ἐγένετο <WG1096> Egeneto arose οὖν <WG3767> oun Then ζήτησις <WG2214> zētēsis a dispute ἐκ <WG1537> ek between τῶν <WG3588> tōn - μαθητῶν <WG3101> mathētōn disciples Ἰωάννου <WG2491> Iōannou John’s μετὰ <WG3326> meta [and] Ἰουδαίου <WG2453> Ioudaiou [a certain] Jew ( TR and the Jews) περὶ <WG4012> peri over [the issue of] καθαρισμοῦ <WG2512> katharismou ceremonial washing .

καὶ <WG2532> kai So ἦλθον <WG2064> ēlthon [John’s disciples] came πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton - Ἰωάννην <WG2491> Iōannēn [him] καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἶπαν <WG2036> eipan said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , Ῥαββί <WG4461> Rhabbi Rabbi , ὃς <WG3739> hos the [One who] ἦν <WG1510> ēn was μετὰ <WG3326> meta with σοῦ <WG4771> sou you πέραν <WG4008> peran beyond τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Ἰορδάνου <WG2446> Iordanou Jordan , ᾧ <WG3739> hō the One σὺ <WG4771> sy you μεμαρτύρηκας <WG3140> memartyrēkas testified about — ἴδε <WG2400> ide “ Look , οὗτος <WG3778> houtos He βαπτίζει <WG907> baptizei is baptizing , καὶ <WG2532> kai and πάντες <WG3956> pantes everyone ἔρχονται <WG2064> erchontai is going πρὸς <WG4314> pros to αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him . ”

Ἀπεκρίθη <WG611> Apekrithē replied Ἰωάννης <WG2491> Iōannēs John καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen . . . , Οὐ <WG3756> Ou vvv δύναται <WG1410> dynatai can ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos “ A man λαμβάνειν <WG2983> lambanein receive ‹οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude only what ἓν› <WG1520> hen . . . ἐὰν <WG1437> ean . . . μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ᾖ <WG1510> ē is δεδομένον <WG1325> dedomenon given αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou - οὐρανοῦ <WG3772> ouranou heaven .

αὐτοὶ <WG846> autoi yourselves ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis You μοι <WG1473> moi - μαρτυρεῖτε <WG3140> martyreite can testify ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that εἶπον <WG2036> eipon I said [ὅτι] <WG3754> hoti - , Οὐκ <WG3756> Ouk not εἰμὶ <WG1510> eimi am ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō ‘ I ὁ <WG3588> ho the Χριστός <WG5547> Christos Christ , ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - Ἀπεσταλμένος <WG649> Apestalmenos sent εἰμὶ <WG1510> eimi am ἔμπροσθεν <WG1715> emprosthen ahead of ἐκείνου <WG1565> ekeinou Him . ’
